p:
The cellular reprogramming toolbox for researchers is rapidly expanding and includes a panoply of neuronal differentiation protocols to generate cells representing various brain regions
21 . PD is a debilitating motor system disorder resulting from the selective degeneration of midbrain dopamine (mDA) neurons located in the substantia nigra pars compacta. Protocols have been established to specifically generate dopaminergic neurons and brain cells with a midbrain molecular profile
195, 196 .
